ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmsub.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsubrg | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldsub | |- - = ( -g ` CCfld ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_subgsubcl | |- ( ( K e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ X e. K /\ Y e. K ) -> ( X - Y ) e. K ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. K /\ Y e. K ) -> ( X - Y ) e. K ) |
